properties.areaDesc: East Santa Barbara Channel from Pt. Conception to Pt. Mugu CA including Santa Cruz Island; Inner waters from Point Mugu to San Mateo Pt. CA including Santa Catalina and Anacapa Islands
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 5 at 10:42PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
Northeast winds 15 to 25 knots with gusts to 35 kt across the
inner coastal waters from Ventura southward to San Mateo Point are
expected to persist through this morning before slowly
diminishing through this afternoon.

The gusty winds are expected to spread through the San Pedro
Channel out to Catalina Island. Strong northeast winds and choppy
northeast wind swell will affect the northeast facing harbors
of Catalina Island, including Avalon Harbor and Two Harbors.

These conditions have a history of vessel damage and loss of life.
Mariners should avoid these areas, or remain in safe harbor until
conditions improve. Avalon Harbor and Two Harbors should NOT be
considered safe harbor during this event..

NWSheadline: GUSTY NORTHEAST WINDS ACROSS THE INNER WATERS WILL AFFECT CATALINA ISLAND INCLUDING AVALON HARBOR THROUGH MONDAY MORNING
